name: Midnight Slayer
description:
Only those who are prepared may survive! Keep your hands ready and prepare to shoot!
In a post apocalyptic scenario, past the 21st century, an young man, the player, must fight a horde of extraterrestrial invaders using a variety of weapons: Knifes, Grenades, Shields and Flashlights. Thus, the player needs to kill the maximum amount of enemies, while avoiding being killed, saving the world from total destruction.

Hone your skills!
Learn how to aim and use your items on the right time, and on the right place. The more efficient you are in killing the aliens, the more credits you may get, allowing you to buy more weapons to save the world.

Action!
That's it! Challenge yourself and your friends, to see who's the best MIDNIGHT SLAYER. So, what are you waiting for? Let's Play!

Controls:
Shoot : Finger Drag.
Use item: Button Tap.
